plot: LIDIA, a bright and talented piano student on the brink of a breakdown, finds herself in the one place she never thought possible: her family. Forgiveness is a word and concept Lidia needs to understand before she can move on.
title: Lidia
plot_es: LIDIA, a bright and talented piano student on the brink of a breakdown, finds herself in the one place she never thought possible: her family. Forgiveness is a word and concept Lidia needs to understand before she can move on.
plot_en: LIDIA, a bright and talented piano student on the brink of a breakdown, finds herself in the one place she never thought possible: her family. Forgiveness is a word and concept Lidia needs to understand before she can move on.
